Interface DrawingObject


  • public interface DrawingObject
    Interface class for any drawable object.
    Author:
    woytek, Ryan Luchs

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean contains(java.awt.Point p)
      Determines if the point clicked is contained by the object.
      void drag(java.awt.Point p)
      Called repeatedly while dragging a new object out to size (typically called from within a mouseDragged() ).
      void draw(java.awt.Graphics g)
      Draw the object.
      void move(java.awt.Point p)
      Called to move an object.
      void setBounds(java.awt.Rectangle b)
      Set the bounding rectangle.
      void setColor(java.awt.Color c)
      Sets the color that the object is drawn with
      void start(java.awt.Point p)
      Called to start drawing a new object.

      • contains

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true if within bounds
